full_summary:
# Notification of Intent to Proceed with the Procurement of Fiber Rope Assemblies

## Canada

### Solicitation Number
* W8485-258181/A
### Amendment Number
* 2
### Closing Date
* 2024-06-13T14:00:00
### Amendments to be considered for a valid bid


The Department of National Defence, Contracting Authority, intends to  issue a request for proposal for the procurement of Fiber Rope Assemblies, Terms and Conditions.

## Description of Contract Work
The Defense Department is seeking to procure Fiber Rope Assemblies, Single Leg (4020-20-003-2889) to meet the specific needs of two key centers:

- 25 CFSD Montreal
- 7 CFSD Edmonton

These centers require a total of 100 units, documented with 50 units to be delivered to each facility by August 2024.

## Notice and Confectionary Guidelines
Given the ongoing impacts of the COVID-19 pandemic, bidders are strongly encouraged to submit their bids electronically using the epost Connect service if feasible, instead of the conventional bid submission process.

When submitting a bid electronically via the epost service, it is helpful to save a copy of the submission before sending it to ensure the bid is correctly formatted.

Please note that all submissions made in French or English are valid.

### Essential Documents:

1. [Tender Notice Call](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/38142/w8485-258181-a-amd-001-fibre-rope-assembly-single-leg-%28en.pdf)
2. [Request for Proposal by Canada Buys](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/38142/w8485-258181-a---request-for-proposal---canada-buys-%28en.pdf)

### Important Attributes

eligibility requirements that are, 
- all-tendering bidders must be a Certified Value Vendor which this work is not listed on the Black List.
- suppliers may be required to deliver by net Payment with in 30 days.

Should you have any inquiries regarding the delivery status, please contact

- Dany Lebel, Director, Supply Chain Services, Defense Department 

phone number issued but trace removed .

email: [dany.lebel2@forces.gc.ca](mailto:dany.lebel2@forces.gc.ca) and 

Delivery should only be made when cleared by the Defense Department logistics procedure,
